Larger species of opossum can eat nearly anything human-sized or smaller. **[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 16 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11 [Giant Opossum](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1253) **Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 192 **Perception** +8; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet **Languages** **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +6 **Str** +4 **Dex** +2 **Con** +3 **Int** -4 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +0 --- **AC** 17 **Fort** +11 **Ref** +8 **Will** +5 +2 circumstance to all saves vs. [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46) **HP** 35 **Resistances** [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) 3 **Feign Death** **Trigger** The opossum is reduced below 15 HP; **Effect** The opossum collapses. It is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) and can use actions that require only its mind, but any other action ends the ruse. A successful DC 18 Perception check to [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) or [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) check to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) is required to determine that the animal is not, in fact, dead.
**Revived Retaliation** **Trigger** The opossum is attacked or disturbed by a creature within reach while Feigning Death; **Effect** The opossum Strikes the triggering creature. --- **Speed** 30 feet, climb 20 feet **Melee** jaws +10 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174)), **Damage** 1d10+4 piercing **Melee** claw +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 1d6+4 slashing **Melee** tail +10 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Grasping Tail** A giant opossum can drag a Small or Tiny creature it has [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) with its tail along with it when it Strides.
